issue.title: MeshLoader.hh no such file or directory

content.raw:
It looks like `SystemPaths.hh` isn't installed either. This should fix it:

~~~
diff -r e49ad5a6e047 include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Jan 17 16:36:30 2017 -0800
+++ b/include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt	Tue Jan 17 18:14:18 2017 -0800
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@
   Mesh.hh
   MeshCSG.hh
   MeshExporter.hh
+  MeshLoader.hh
   MeshManager.hh
   MouseEvent.hh
   MovingWindowFilter.hh
@@ -39,6 +40,7 @@
   SkeletonNode.hh
   SubMesh.hh
   System.hh
+  SystemPaths.hh
   STLLoader.hh
   SVGLoader.hh
   Time.hh
~~~
content.html:
It looks like SystemPaths.hh isn't installed either. This should fix it:

diff -r e49ad5a6e047 include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt    Tue Jan 17 16:36:30 2017 -0800
+++ b/include/ignition/common/CMakeLists.txt    Tue Jan 17 18:14:18 2017 -0800
@@ -26,6 +26,7 @@
   Mesh.hh
   MeshCSG.hh
   MeshExporter.hh
+  MeshLoader.hh
   MeshManager.hh
   MouseEvent.hh
   MovingWindowFilter.hh
@@ -39,6 +40,7 @@
   SkeletonNode.hh
   SubMesh.hh
   System.hh
+  SystemPaths.hh
   STLLoader.hh
   SVGLoader.hh
   Time.hh
